name: HuggingFaceM4/WebSight
description: The WebSight dataset is a comprehensive resource for those interested in automating web design processes. It consists of a collection of synthetically generated English websites, each with corresponding screenshots, available in two versions: v0.1 with HTML and CSS, and v0.2 with HTML and Tailwind CSS. This dataset is an essential tool for tasks such as UI code generation and screenshot-to-code conversion, making it a valuable asset for researchers and developers alike.
citeAs: @misc{laurençon2024unlocking,       title={Unlocking the conversion of Web Screenshots into HTML Code with the WebSight Dataset},        author={Hugo Laurençon and Léo Tronchon and Victor Sanh},       year={2024},       eprint={2403.09029},       archivePrefix={arXiv},       primaryClass={cs.HC} }
creator: HuggingFaceM4
keywords: Synthetic Web Design, UI Code Generation, Screenshot-to-Code Conversion
